items.title: Jump on off-season $100 savings for Greenworks’ 2,300 PSI electric pressure washer at its new $188 low
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best off-season savings on the Greenworks 2300 PSI TruBrushless Electric Pressure Washer at $188.49 shipped, which beats out its direct pricing by $100. While it carries a $360 MSRP direct from Greenworks, it hasn’t been seen that high at Amazon since April, with it coming down from $288 here. Discounts up until now have gone as low as a one-time $189 back in July, with things keeping above $230 otherwise, but now you’re able to get a larger-than-ever $100 markdown off the going rate (and $172 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked.

items.title: EcoFlow’s final Xmas flash sale drops RIVER 2 Pro 768Wh power station to $299 low for 72-hours, more from $749
items.summary:
As the last addition to EcoFlow’s final Christmas Sale days, the brand has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to 61% savings across four offers, starting with the RIVER 2 Pro Portable Power Station at $299 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $16. Coming down from its $599 MSRP direct from the brand, and starting lower from $529 at Amazon, discounts kept the costs above $359 for much of the year, falling to $339 during October’s Prime Day event which ushered in further drops as low as $299. Of course, this was the brand’s original model to have sidecar attachments, with the Easy 3 SideCar e-bike at $3,509 shipped and the newer Easy SideCar Sahara also at $3,509 shipped – both down from $3,899.
